about_the_game:
Welcome to a first-person 3D platformer where you play as a Chihuahua in a spacesuit on roller skates. Your goal? Blow up three generators per level and keep moving, while enemies do their best to stop you. Grenade launcher? Check. Bombs? Oh, definitely. Gliding through the air? Why not!

Here’s what you’re in for:

  • Combine Your Moves: Master gliding jumps, shooting, and tactical bomb placement to overcome challenges.

  • Explore Huge Spaces: Claim advantageous positions, search for secrets, and remember: height is your friend.

  • Change the Level: Rearrange certain elements of the environment to open new paths and possibilities.

  • No Bullet Sponges: Most enemies go down in one hit. So do you. The challenge ramps up with smarter enemy placement and combinations.

  • Turret Combat: Use the environment and stationary weapons to turn the tide against your enemies.

  • 🐾 Stylish Hero: Play as a fearless roller-skating super-Chihuahua ready to outmaneuver anything in its way!

  • Three Respawns: You get four chances. Fail again, and it’s back to the start of the level.

Who is Maya?

Maya is a chihuahua from an ancient race from space. Once, her people decided to invade humanity, but not all agreed. Some chihuahuas rushed to Earth to warn the most advanced civilization of that time—the Maya—and help protect the planet. Together, they succeeded, and part of the chihuahua race remained on Earth to watch over it. Now, the threat has returned, and Maya the chihuahua steps up to defend the planet, just like her ancestors once did. It's time to get off the couch. Maya is going for a walk.

Add it to your wishlist and get ready for some explosive fun!

name: Maya Steps Out

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-4460 CPU @ 3.20GHz 3.20 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: radeon rx550/550 series 4 GB
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 и Intel Core i5-10400F
  • Memory: 10 GB RAM

short_description: A cosmic first-person 3D platformer where you play as a roller-skating Chihuahua armed with a grenade launcher and bombs! Blast through enemies, glide through the air, and destroy generators on each level to unlock the path forward.
